Our Solution

Walkie-Talkie Integration

Captures all walkie-talkie communications instantly on VoiceMe.AI’s Management Dashboard.

Hands-Free, AI-Powered Communication Solution

VoiceMe.AI’s smartphone app unifies communication flow between all mobile, operational teams and management. Leveraging proprietary NLP technology, our application allows employees to communicate hands-free by sending and receiving messages just using their voice. Messages are instantly captured and stored in both audio and text form, and they are easy to retrieve at any time, so you won’t forget what team members said. When paired with a Bluetooth headset, messages are able to be sent with just one-click voice activation — no need for clunky walkie-talkies or time consuming texting. Additionally, our platform supports all other standard modes of communication, such as calling (VoIP), texting, and push-to-talk functionality all contained within the mobile app.

Management Dashboard

The Management Dashboard allows managers to gain actionable insights into their mobile, deskless workforce. Finally being able to understand what is actually happening within their teams, the dashboard helps managers optimize resource allocation and resolve employee conflicts along with improving service recoveries, employee engagement, compliance, and liability protection. All the conversations among team members — either using walkie-talkies or our mobile app — are conveniently captured in real time, offering unprecedented operational visibility into the workforce. Managers can also choose to receive instant notifications of certain events that need their immediate attention.
